name: The Mansion (itch) (thomas_yang)
description:
This is a 2-day project made for Godot Wild Jam #30.

Note: This is an experimental game without Visual/ Graphic.

  • Press WASD to move
  • Click Mouse Left Click to interact

 I had a ton of fun doing my own voice editing (mind you it's cringey~) . I hope you can enjoy every cringe moment...

Credits:

BGM:

  • Dark Fantasy Studio - Adam
  • Dark Fantas Studio - Mououahah
  • Dark Fantasy Studio - Suit pride and class

Sound Effects:

  • Pistol Sound - Michel Baradari
  • Key - Vinrax
  • Steps - Jute
  • Monster - copyc4t
  • Heartbeat - Heartbeat sounds | OpenGameArt.org
  • Rat Monster - qubodup
  • Hit Sound - 37 hits/punches | OpenGameArt.org
